title: Enhanced Story Generator App
description: A single-page application that generates personalized stories based on user input prompts with enhanced character, time, and setting details

pages.name: Home
pages.purpose: Primary interface for users to input detailed story parameters and view generated stories

ui_components: Header with app title and description
Character details input section with name field
Prompt input text area with placeholder text
Story display area with formatted text
state: storyHistory: array of {characterName: string, timePeriod: string, locationSetting: string, prompt: string, story: string, timestamp: string}
interactions: User selects time period from dropdown
User types in prompt input field
User clicks Generate button to create story
Loading state displays during story generation
Generated story appears in display area
User can regenerate story with same parameters
User can save story to history
User can share story via copy button
Error handling for invalid inputs or generation failures
Form validation prevents submission with empty required fields
acceptance_criteria: Character name field accepts text up to 100 characters
Time period dropdown includes at least 5 time periods
Location setting accepts text up to 200 characters
Prompt input accepts text up to 500 characters
Generated stories are formatted with proper paragraph breaks
Error messages display clearly for invalid inputs
Loading state shows during generation process
User can regenerate stories with same parameters
Stories can be saved to local history with all parameters
Share functionality copies story to clipboard
Sample prompts display when user clicks suggestion button
Form validation prevents submission with empty required fields
Responsive design works on mobile and desktop
All story parameters are preserved in history
